author: SanghyunKo
body:
#### PR description:

Adding Relval subdirectories `GenWeight` & `LHEWeight` to detect odds in GEN/LHE weight contents, to avoid any potential issues that we had experienced before - such as #36705, #27918, cms-sw/cmsdist#6688, [hypernews](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/generators/5234/1.html), and many other...

Each GEN/LHE subdirectory contains the number of weights, distribution of weights (normalized to the nominal), leading lepton/jet Pt & . In addition, GEN directory contains ISR/FSR up/down (2 or 1/2) variations and their ratio to the nominal, while LHE directory contains envelop of scale variations and PDF uncertainty ( RMS) and their ratio to the nominal. Assumed 9 scale variations & 103 PDF variations, which should hold for most of the cases.

Demo of Relval plots with workflow 556 (TTbar Powheg+Pythia8) would look like [this](https://sako.web.cern.ch/Validation/wgtValDemo_v2/TTbarPow/Generator.html).

#### PR validation:

Tested with following GEN workflows:
* 504 (QCD Pt-30 Pythia8) - no LHE or GEN weight
* 555 (DY+jets aMCatNLO+Pythia8) - has LHE but no GEN (PS) weight
* 556 (TTbar Powheg+Pythia8) - has both LHE & GEN weights

as the routine will run for all GEN workflows, there should be no exception regardless of having LHE products or not.
title: Add GEN/LHE weight validation subdirectories for GEN Relval
